DOC.brief_summary: Prevalence rate of osteoporosis and it's actual management condition in Prostate cancer patients who takes LHRH antagonist and anti androgen
DOC.brief_title: Prevalence of Osteoporosis in Korean Prostate Cancer Patients Who is Receiving LHRH Agonist and/or Anti-androgen Agent
DOC.criteria: pathologic confirmation of prostate cancer patients who are taking LHRH antagonist or anti androgen or both of them within 6 months since starting. patients who are hard to be analysed by limitation of chart record according to investigators'discretion patients who already have been registered in this study
